title: Vowels
content: Learn to read and pronounce the Vietnamese vowels

title: e
content: /ɛ˧/ Similar to  the 'ai' in "air", but shorter

title: ê
content: /ə̆j/ Similar to 'i' in "hi" but shorter. Sometimes pronounced as /ə̯/ as in the 'e' in "dress"

title: i
content: /i/ Similar to the 'ea' in "seat"", or after any vowel letter /j/ as in the 'y' in ""yellow"""

title: o
content: /ɔ/ Similar to 'o' in "clock", except before 'ng' /ăw/, and /w/ when combined with some other vowels

title: ô
content: /o/ Similar to the 'aw' in "yawn", or  /ə̆w/ before ng and c, or  /ə̯/ in uô

title: ơ
content: /ə/ Similar to the last 'a' in "Camera", or /ə̯/ in ươ

title: u
content: /u/ Similar to the 'oo' in "book", or /w/ after 'q' or with some vowel combinations

title: y
content: /i/ Similar to the 'ea' in "seat", or after any vowel letter /j/ as in the 'y' in "yellow"
